header.title: GemX Analyzer
header.subtitle: Transform your project documentation into actionable insights with AI-driven analysis.

tokenUsage.title: Token Usage Warning
tokenUsage.usageText: You have used {percentage}% of your monthly token limit ({consumed} / {limit}).

history.title: Analysis History
history.compareInstruction: Select two analyses of the same type to compare their evolution.

empty.title: No History Found
empty.subtitle: Your completed analyses will appear here.

clearConfirm.title: Clear entire history?
clearConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all analysis history? This action cannot be undone.

notifications.fileLoaded: File '{fileName}' loaded into the text area.
notifications.noAnalysisForChat: You must load an analysis before starting a chat.
notifications.chatError: An error occurred during the chat session.
notifications.emptyRepoUrl: Please enter a GitHub repository URL.
notifications.noGithubPat: GitHub Personal Access Token not found. Please set it in Settings > Integrations.
notifications.emptyJiraKey: Please enter a Jira project key.
notifications.noJiraCredentials: Jira credentials not found. Please set them in Settings > Integrations.
notifications.apiKeyTestFailure: API Key test failed. Please check the key and try again.
notifications.apiKeyTestEmpty: API Key cannot be empty. Please enter a key to test.
notifications.emptyContext: Project context is empty. Please add one or more files before analyzing.
notifications.exportError: Failed to export data. See console for details.
notifications.importSuccess: Data imported successfully! The app will now reload.
notifications.importError: Failed to import data. The file may be corrupt or invalid.
